channel.title: How DO I make a shop that takes a different currecy in PI?
channel.description: Ok I understand how to make shops I just dont know how to add a shop with different currency ex: ecto tokens or w.e and I dont know how to change the prices of them if anyone could explain this to me or show me I'd appreciate it.
